name: Questbert
description:
In a world where everyone's off on fantastic adventures you're stuck in town working a dead end job as a rat catcher. But all that's about to change thanks to some help from a new friend and their strange "game".

Recruit adventurers, train and outfit them, and send them off on jobs as you build the best adventuring outfit this town's ever seen!

---

Thanks for checking out the alpha!

  • Questbert is an idle-rpg that is very much in-development. 
  • Right now there's about 30-60 minutes of gameplay and we'd love your feedback! 
  • Please note that there's no save-system yet, so your progress will be lost if you close the game!
  • There's also no sound or music at this stage.
